text:
Cozy place different from the other outlets
Staff here are easy to talk to very nice experience
Service is very good. LAN is very cozy and small but still fits big groups. Food and drinks taste great and good collection of games

Nice and cozy LAN spot, definitely feels more home-ly than the Holland Village or Lavender branches.

Staff is very friendly and welcoming, Nigel assisted me with many questions and made my stay very enjoyable

Elixir Esports is one of the best gaming cafés I’ve been to! The atmosphere is amazing, with high-end PCs, comfortable seating, and super-fast internet. The staff is friendly and always ready to help, making sure everything runs smoothly. Highly recommend for both casual and competitive gamers!

I had an amazing experience at Elixir Esports! The setup is top-notch, with high-performance gaming PCs and an incredibly immersive atmosphere. The RGB lighting and sleek design make it feel like a true gamer’s paradise.

The gaming area is spacious, and I really liked how the PCs are powerful enough to handle any game smoothly. The chairs are super comfortable, which is a big plus for long gaming sessions.

staffs are also very friendly and helpful
